meanings.definition: Not causing disagreement or argument; uncontroversial.
meanings.sent1: The decision to have pizza for lunch was a noncontroversial choice among the group.
meanings.sent2: The color of the walls was a noncontroversial topic during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to discuss such a noncontroversial issue after the heated debate.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as noncontroversial as a sunny day in spring.
meanings.sent5: The noncontroversial nature of the movie made it enjoyable for everyone.

meanings.definition: Not likely to cause disagreement or argument; uncontroversial.
meanings.sent1: The new policy was designed to be noncontroversial and easily accepted by all employees.
meanings.sent2: His suggestion for a team outing was met with noncontroversial approval from the staff.
meanings.sent3: The noncontroversial nature of the topic made it a breeze to discuss.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a noncontroversial blend of colors.
meanings.sent5: The noncontroversial decision to order dessert was met with smiles all around.
